boardgame.name: Teotihuacan: Città degli Dei
Teotihuacan: City of Gods
Teotihuacan: Ciudad de Dioses
Teotihuacan: Die Stadt der Götter
Teotihuacan: La Cité Des Dieux

Teotihuacan: Stad der Goden
Теотиуакан. Город богов
テオティワカン：シティオブゴッズ
boardgame.description: Travel back in time to the greatest city in Mesoamerica. Witness the glory and the twilight of the powerful pre-Columbian civilization. Strategize, accrue wealth, gain the favour of the gods, and become the builder of the magnificent Pyramid of the Sun._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Teotihuacan: City of Gods, each player commands a force of worker dice, which grow in strength with every move. On your turn, you move a worker around a modular board, always choosing one of two areas of the location tile you land on: one offering you an action (and a worker upgrade), the other providing you with a powerful bonus (but without an upgrade)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;While managing their workforce and resources, players develop new technologies, climb the steps of the three great temples, build houses for the inhabitants of the city, and raise the legendary and breath-taking Pyramid of the Sun in the centre of the city._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each game is played in three eras. As the dawn of the Aztecs comes closer, player efforts (and their ability to feed their workforce) are evaluated a total of three times. The player with the most fame is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

International buyers are welcome, but be aware that international shipping these days is not cheap! I will only use USPS to ship international. If you are relatively close by and wish to pick up the game from me in person in Los Angeles, CA, that can also be arranged. I also do a lot of driving for work, mainly on the Westside and would be more than happy to drop the game off if you live in that neck of the woods...or meet you halfway if you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t.

I bought the game at Essen SPIEL 2018 amongst some other games, but I decided to sell it because it appears too complex for me and my board game group. The game is in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;like new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition and was only unpackaged and play-tested once. It is currently out of stock at Schwerkraft Verlag (German publisher). Important note: The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Dice Settlers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; promo that was given away with copies of this game is NOT included. The price is excluding shipping costs, which we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d have to negotiate based on your shipping preferences and location. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also selling the promo tiles for Teotihuacan over at: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/product/1752103 If you are interested in purchasing both, I can offer a 5€ discount (total of 60€) and of course the shipping costs only apply once.
